game_engine module¶

Contains in-game functions

game_engine.attack(coordinates, board, battleships)¶

Return true if the coordinate (row,col) is a ship, else return false. If the ship value is 0 in battleships, then the ship is sunk.

game_engine.cli_coordinates_input()¶

Takes inputs for x, y coordinates and returns tuple.

game_engine.simple_game_loop()¶

Runs a single loop of the game.

Battleships
